response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product to you, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and profitability. This product is tailored to meet your specific needs and offers unparalleled benefits. Given its value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a high-quality solution at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.", "product_price": 950000}
